questions.question: 1. This is a peaceful village. A terrible disaster happened there a decade ago.

choices.answer: This is a peaceful village where a terrible disaster happened a decade ago.
This village is where a terrible disaster happened there a decade ago.
This peaceful village is where a terrible disaster happened a decade ago.

questions.question: 2. Dylan asked me if I had been late for school the previous day.

choices.answer: Dylan asked me, "Were you late for school yesterday?‚Äù
Dylan asked me, "Were you late for school the day before?"
Dylan asked me, "Had you been late for school yesterday?"

questions.question: 3. My father cannot drive. My mother cannot drive either.

choices.answer: Neither of my father nor my mother cannot drive.
Neither of my parents cannot drive.
Neither of my parents can drive.

questions.question: 4. Everyone here seems to know the lady. She is my neighbour Mrs Chin.

choices.answer: My neighbour Mrs Chin is whom everyone here seems to know.
Everyone here seems to know the lady whom is my neighbour Mrs Chin.
The lady whom everyone here seems to know is my neighbour Mrs Chin.

questions.question: 5. Rachel is diligent. She did not do well in the recent examinations.

choices.answer: Despite her diligence, Rachel did not do well in the recent examinations.
Despite her diligence, she did not do well in the recent examinations.
Despite her not doing well in the recent examinations, Rachel is diligent.
